reviews.review: I'll be the unpopular one.... The one was just OK.  After seeing recently The Guardians of the Galaxy 2 , there's no doubt it didn't measure up.
One of the best avengers movies ever made. It's perfect. Made the 9 years waiting worth it. I'll give Avengers: Infinity War an A+

it is important to emphasize that the "Infinity War" is ultimately the first part of Epos, which will culminate in May of next year with the fourth installment of Avengers' plots. It is customary to look at such divided projects in full perspective and to analyze backward, but here Marvell's decision to separate them allows them to exist as individuals. As such, "Infinity War" is, without doubt, the most impressive, sophisticated, complex and sweeping film ever seen since Marvel's heroes entered our lives, and his place in the top of the universe is guaranteed. It is a complex, moving and surprising work, one that combines tragedy and humor and makes up a huge, complete cinematic experience that is a cinematic experience.
Action packed.fun.well written. You name it infinity war is a absolute must see

i still remember sitting silent in the theatre after the movie had ended... the whole theatre, no one moved, no one spoke, everyone just sat there and took it in... such an amazing screenplay to tie the different movie groups together, it flowed logically, it all made sense, which made the heartbreaks andvtriumphs feel so real. the ebs and flows of this movie are rivaled ONLY by those of Endgame
Action packed, Exciting and a must see film.

An extremely heavy movie that constantly walks a fine line between suspenseful and ridiculous. Seeing the heroes interact with each other- and, at times, the reaper- is constantly engaging. Also contains the single best battle scene in the MCU.

I loved Avenger's Infinity War. It's in my top 5 best films of all time. I absolutely supported "Thanos" and his vision. He is an arch super villain. The "avengers" are a formidable super hero force trying to save the universe. This film will "rock your world" with power and super force.
